article.Heading: Rail Budget 2016 a step in right direction: Navkar Corp
article.Summary: Anish Maheshwari, Group CFO, Navkar Corp says, the company is doing well in the domestic markets currently.
article.Body:
Since the Railway Budget announcement on Thursday, many companies catering to the sector have called it an ambitious one. Navkar Corp, however, believes otherwise. In an interview to CNBC-TV18, Anish Maheshwari, Group CFO of the company says, this Budget is a step in the right direction.

The company will benefit from Dedicated Freight Corridor Corporation (DFCC) making freight rates more competitive. He says Navkar Corp is doing well in the domestic markets currently.

Watch video for more
